body_html:
@zheng-xq @andrewharp @mrry

It my fault, now it's ok.

I develop under Windows, and I use Android.mk to build.

I must use LOCAL_WHOLE_STATIC_LIBRARIES instead of LOCAL_STATIC_LIBRARIES to link these libraries. And it also depend on android-ndk-r10e, just like bazel build.

LOCAL_WHOLE_STATIC_LIBRARIES :=
android_tensorflow_lib
protobuf re2
protobuf_lite
protos_all_cc

Now I can develop APP under Windows with Eclipse and Android.mk.

thanks.

I must use LOCAL_WHOLE_STATIC_LIBRARIES instead of LOCAL_STATIC_LIBRARIES to link these libraries. And it also depend on android-ndk-r10e, just like bazel build.

body:
@zheng-xq @andrewharp @mrry 

It my fault, now it's ok.

I develop under Windows, and I use Android.mk to build.

I must use LOCAL_WHOLE_STATIC_LIBRARIES instead of LOCAL_STATIC_LIBRARIES to link these libraries. And it also depend on android-ndk-r10e, just like bazel build.

LOCAL_WHOLE_STATIC_LIBRARIES := \
                                android_tensorflow_lib \
                                protobuf re2 \
                                protobuf_lite \
                                protos_all_cc

Now I can develop APP under Windows with Eclipse and Android.mk.

thanks.
